Leonardo da Vinci - I would bring Leonardo da Vinci back to life because of his incredible artistic and scientific talents. He was a true polymath and his work in fields such as painting, sculpture, architecture, music, and engineering are still admired today. Cleopatra - I would bring Cleopatra back to life because of her intelligence, charisma, and political savvy. Bringing her back to life would allow her to continue her reign and potentially have an even greater impact on the world. Confidence score: 0.8

William Shakespeare - I would bring William Shakespeare back to life because of his incredible literary achievements. Marie Curie - I would bring Marie Curie back to life because of her pioneering work in the field of radioactivity. She was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize and the first person to win two Nobel Prizes in different fields.
